content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0) with coal fuel
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Electric pole network connecting various structures

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup 1
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden chest at (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup 2
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Output chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup 3
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Output chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)

### Automation Science Pack Assembly
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Input inserters at (10.5, 12.5) and (10.5, 13.5)
- Input chests at (11.5, 12.5) and (11.5, 14.5)
- Connected belt system from (8.5, 11.5) to (1.5, 16.5)

### Research Lab
- Lab with automation science pack input

# ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Distance Errors
- Move closer to target location before attempting to place entities
- Maximum placement distance is 10 units from player position

### Entity Collision Errors
- Check if target position is already occupied before placing entities
- Consider alternative positions or directions when placement fails
- When using place_entity_next_to, increase spacing if initial position is occupied

### Resource Management
- Ensure required materials are in inventory before attempting insertion operations
- Check fuel levels in burner entities to prevent "out of fuel" warnings

### Assembly Machine Setup
- Verify all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Ensure proper connection between input chests, inserters and assembly machine

### Power System
- Maintain fuel supply in boilers
- Ensure proper fluid connections between offshore pump, boiler and steam engine
